about_the_game:
Greetings Traveler, welcome to the Labyrinth!

Get ready for a wild ride through a fantasy world where the adventures are steamy and the stakes are high. In the Labyrinth of Lust, every corner turned is a step closer to pleasure... or peril.

Meet the Girls



Prepare to meet a cast that's as sexy as they are quirky. From a voluptuous succubus to a missing sweetheart and a kinky chain enthusiast, this labyrinth is teeming with characters who are ready to show you a good time.

Roguelike Deckbuilding



Strategy is king and every choice can lead to ecstasy or agony. Can you play your cards right?

Visual Novel



Get entangled in tales of passion and peril. Will you follow your heart or fall for the temptations of the labyrinth?

Lilura - The Succubus



Can't get enough of busty demons? We've got you covered. Follow Lilura's story as she takes you on a journey filled with temptation, seduction, and maybe a little bit of domination.

Mitsuki - The Petite Cat Girl



Mitsuki might look sweet and innocent, but don't let her playful purrs fool you. This catgirl has claws, and she's not afraid to use them. Get ready for a wild ride with our feline femme fatale.

Elysia - The Missing Girlfriend



Elysia's more than just a damsel in distress. She's cute, she's lost, and she's probably wandering around here somewhere. Will you find her, or get distracted by our other... attractions?

Nalani - The BDSM Merchant



Nalani is not your average chain enthusiast. She's a master of self-bondage and diligently practising her craft whenever she is not selling important goods to adventurers. Are you ready to unravel the chains that bind her fate?

Join the fun in the Labyrinth of Lust, where fantasy meets kink in the most delightful ways!

name: Labyrinth of Lust

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit versions only)
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1Gb Video Memory
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Dive into a steamy adventure where eye-catching ladies await rescue! Play your cards right to progress the different story-arcs and unlock all the saucy scenes. Labyrinth of Lust is a crossover between roguelike-deckbuilding and visual novels for an adult audience.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, German*, Dutch*, Japanese*, Korean*, Polish*, Simplified Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
